title: Science Expertise Enhancement Course Through Personalized Learning Path Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experimental methods, along with experience in basic project execution
context.additional_context: Learners aim to enter professional fields (medical/legal/technical) and conduct learning activities in a smartphone-centric technological environment. Includes both individual and collaborative learning experiences

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously construct and modify personalized learning pathways in the science domain.
Learners collaboratively design learning pathways with peers using collaboration tools, enhancing their knowledge-construction skills.
Learners demonstrate their science problem-solving competencies through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
